Reviews.Content: entered 2012 super summer cruise car looking convenient reasonably priced stay scouted options line booked brookwood priceline fantastic absolutely negative comments called ahead friday noon checkin empty cars registration arrived 30 minutes ready checkin easy quick families looking reservation despite sold staff calls assist convenient location yellow route restaurants close car wash street nice course door breakfast exceptional adequate times supplied clean evening hot cobblers ice cream cookies received nice touch quarters car wash questions roll readily provided manager friendly highly organized hard worker helping guests clean soft towels ac units shower sufficient pressure spray cleaning staff friendly nice word guests pool nice kept clean yard parking maintained clean pictures motel justice added amenities price reasonable considering amenities cleanliness friendly atmosphere definitely stay hats fellow exceptional presentation
